Html:
The Windows task scheduler blocks attempts to set a trigger to an interval of less than 1 minute. For example, trying to enter '30 seconds' results in this error message: http://screencast.com/t/VcEt9MTylG
Please consider adding a similar message to the trigger dialogs of the library.

Currently, the library dialog closes and the user is not aware that (because the value was invalid) the interval option became disabled.
Good idea. I'll get that into the next release.
